item.title: [508+] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:1, topic:326636”]Well, my server has a pk system. it puts kills into ur character when you kill someone. so i want new normals to atleast kill 10 people before they can do ::food command. it has fishing so thats why i want this. will anyone help me.
i added the kills == 10 part and it works. but how can i add it so that it’s 10 and higher not just equals 10.
and the bottom command how can i make it when player do ::food and they have less than 10 kills so they are the only ones get the message when they type ::food.
i need this because i put this for 6 or 7 other commands.

[quote]if(cmd[0].equals(“food”) && p.kills == 10){
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 386, 5000);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3024, 1);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “To get food, You must go to ::fish and fish some food and kill atleast 10 people in PvP.”);
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“food”)) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You need 10 kills to fish some food.!”);
}[/quote][/quote]
try this

f(cmd[0].equals(“food”) && p.kills >= 10){
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 386, 5000);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3024, 1);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “To get food, You must go to ::fish and fish some food and kill atleast 10 people in PvP.”);
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“food”) && p.kills <=10) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You need 10 kills to fish some food.!”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: [508+] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Well, my server has a pk system. it puts kills into ur character when you kill someone. so i want new normals to atleast kill 10 people before they can do ::food command. it has fishing so thats why i want this. will anyone help me.
i added the kills == 10 part and it works. but how can i add it so that it’s 10 and higher not just equals 10.
and the bottom command how can i make it when player do ::food and they have less than 10 kills so they are the only ones get the message when they type ::food.
i need this because i put this for 6 or 7 other commands.

if(cmd[0].equals("food") && p.kills == 10){ Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 386, 5000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3024, 1); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "To get food, You must go to ::fish and fish some food and kill atleast 10 people in PvP."); } if (cmd[0].equals("food")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You need 10 kills to fish some food.!"); }

Read full topic
